mapper.select: SELECT oa.id, oa.customer_id, oa.applicant_id, oa.outing_reason, oa.outing_date, oa.expected_return_date, oa.actual_return_date, oa.apply_status, oa.approver_id, oa.approve_time, oa.approve_remark, oa.create_time, c.customer_name, su1.real_name as applicant_name, su2.real_name as approver_name, CONCAT(b.building_name, '-', r.room_no, '-', bed.bed_no) as bed_info FROM outing_apply oa INNER JOIN customer c ON oa.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su1 ON oa.applicant_id = su1.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su2 ON oa.approver_id = su2.id LEFT JOIN bed bed ON c.bed_id = bed.id LEFT JOIN room r ON bed.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN building b ON r.building_id = b.id WHERE oa.id = #{id} AND oa.deleted = 0
